Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"
Основные свойства",! Write "",! Write "
",! Write "

" Write !,"
Да
" Write !,"
Отмена

Method.name: OnPageCSPROOT
Method.Implementation: s skip=%request.Get("skip") s addrpath=%request.Get("addrpath") Write ! Do ..OnPageHTML()

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname")))_"</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,"<script language=""Jscript"" src=""common.js"">" Write "</script>" Write !,"<script language=""JScript"">" Write !,"var argArr=window.dialogArguments.split("";"");",! Write "var ItemID=argArr[0];",! Write "var ClassName=argArr[1];",! Write !,"function startFun(){",! Write "if(!window.confirm(""Применить все указанные параметры к "_(addrpath)_"""))return false;",! Write "xmldoc=PropTable.GetXmlContent();",! Write "ok=SplitSendXml(ItemID,ClassName,xmldoc,"""","""_(%session.SessionId)_""",""Store.Action.CellsMultiChange"")",! Write "if(isNaN(ok)){alert(ok)}",! Write "else{returnValue=1;window.close();}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function load(){",! Write "PropTable.DownLoadPairs(ClassName,"""","""_(skip)_""");",! Write "}",! Write !,!,"</script>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html XMLNS:SKLAD2>" Write !,"<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLAD2"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/table.htc"" >",! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
